projects.name: Pepsi Supply Chain Assessment
projects.description:
• Conducted a comprehensive assessment of Pepsi’s supply chain operations.
  • Analyzed various components including procurement, logistics, and distribution, and provided actionable recommendations for optimization.
projects.skills: Supply Chain Analysis, Strategic Planning, Presentation Skills

projects.name: Data Integration in Supply Chain
projects.description: Created an in-depth presentation on the importance of data integration in supply chain operations. Highlighted best practices, tools, and methodologies to enhance data flow and decision-making processes within the supply chain after analyzing various case studies.
projects.skills: Data Integration, Operations Management, Presentation Skills

projects.name: Generative AI in Supply Chain
projects.description: Developed a report and presentation on the applications of generative AI in supply chain management. Explored the trailblazers, potential benefits, challenges, and future trends of integrating AI technologies in supply chain processes.
projects.skills: AI Applications, Supply Chain Analytics, Research and Reporting

projects.name: Procurement and Supplier Scorecard Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed a business case involving Metalcraft’s procurement strategies and supplier performance using scorecards. Provided insights and recommendations to improve supplier relationships and procurement efficiency.
projects.skills: Procurement Strategies, Supplier Evaluation, Case Analysis

projects.name: Lean Six Sigma Practices at Home Depot
projects.description: Conducted an analysis of Home Depot’s Lean Six Sigma practices. Identified key methodologies implemented, assessed their effectiveness, and suggested improvements.
projects.skills: Lean Six Sigma, Process Improvement, Data Analysis

projects.name: Group Negotiations Simulation
projects.description: Participated in multiple rounds of mock group negotiations between a union and a manufacturing company. Focused on developing negotiation strategies, understanding stakeholder interests and achieving mutually beneficial outcomes.

projects.name: Efficiency Analysis Using NYC Yellow Cab Data
projects.description: Conducted a business analysis using NYC yellow cab data to identify patterns and improve operational efficiency. Analyzed data to find trends related to ride durations, peak hours and routes.
projects.skills: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Operational Efficiency

projects.name: INDO-US TRADE RELATIONS: EFFECT OF CHANGE OF GOVERNMENT
projects.class: Authors: Dr. Raksha Thakur, Harshmeet Kaur Chawla, Neha Dua, Dr. Nidhi Sharma
projects.description: Abstract: International trade and trade relations are affected by the macro business environment including political and legal environment. India, being a democratic country, the government is elected by the people. Political parties have different ideologies which are reflected in the policies they make to support trade in the country. There is a significant role of government in determining the policies that affect the International trade and trade relations of a country. The USA has been one of the biggest trade partners of India for several years. This study was conducted to observe the pattern of Indo-US Import, Export and respective growth rate before and after the change of government in India in 2014 and to study its effect on India’s trade relations with the US.
